name: Shoot Them All
description: Crowds of aliens from outer space fill streets of a small town in Texas, killing anyone who gets in their eyes. You - one of the last survivors, but you have nowhere to run, so your only goal - to avenge your hometown, taking with you to the hell as many enemies as you can kill! Use all of the weapons that will be able to pick up a fallen enemies or found in town buildings. Good luck!
